What is the type of problem ?: saving Describe the problem: Good morning, how are you? Canva is a powerful tool and with each passing day I am more surprised by its possibilities, but I have been facing a problem lately. I do my normal art with all the text elements in place, but after I save it, the texts move out of place, usually they go down a little bit from the place I put and I have to reposition and save again hoping to be lucky not to move out of place. I would like to know why this happens and how to resolve it. Thanks in advance!
